scripts.pretest: rimraf build && mkdir build && json2module package.json > build/package.js && node rollup.node
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && rollup -c --banner "$(preamble)" && uglifyjs -b beautify=false,preamble="'$(preamble)'" build/d3.js -c negate_iife=false -m -o build/d3.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3/build/d3.js d3.v4.js && cp ../d3/build/d3.min.js d3.v4.min.js && git add d3.v4.js d3.v4.min.js && git commit -m "d3 ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd - && cd ../d3-bower && git pull && cp ../d3/LICENSE ../d3/README.md ../d3/build/d3.js ../d3/build/d3.min.js . && git add -- LICENSE README.md d3.js d3.min.js && git commit -m "${npm_package_version}" && git tag -am "${npm_package_version}" v${npm_package_version} && git push && git push --tags && cd - && zip -j build/d3.zip -- LICENSE README.md API.md CHANGES.md build/d3.js build/d3.min.js
